comment: Obsolete version of ~ spsbe as of 7-Jul-2023. A specialization theorem. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jun-1993.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 3-May-2018.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
